mapper.sql: ID, A0100, B0100, SECRET_RELATED_POST, SECRET_RELATED_LEVEL, SECRET_REVIEW_DATE, START_DATE, FINISH_DATE, QR_SECRET_RELATED_POST, QR_SECRET_RELATED_LEVEL, QR_START_DATE, QR_FINISH_DATE, QR_USER_ID, QR_TIME, IMPORT_YEAR,PROC_PERSON_ID,PERSON_STATE,POST,SFQR
mapper.select:
SELECT t.*, b.B0101 FROM oms_smr_oldinfo t LEFT JOIN b01 b on t.B0100 = b.B0100 WHERE 1=1
and t.PROC_PERSON_ID = #{id}

SELECT t.*, b.b0101 as b0101 FROM oms_smr_oldinfo t LEFT JOIN b01 b on t.B0100 = b.B0100 WHERE 1=1
and t.A0100 = #{a0100}
and t.QR_FINISH_DATE is not null and t.QR_FINISH_DATE >= now()
ORDER BY t.QR_FINISH_DATE desc , t.SECRET_RELATED_LEVEL desc

SELECT t.*, b.b0101 as b0101 FROM oms_smr_oldinfo t LEFT JOIN b01 b on t.B0100 = b.B0100 WHERE 1=1
and t.A0100 = #{a0100} and t.QR_FINISH_DATE is not null and t.QR_FINISH_DATE >= now()
ORDER BY t.QR_FINISH_DATE desc , t.SECRET_RELATED_LEVEL desc
